recipesJson.name: One-Eyed Jack
recipesJson.author: SixStrings952
recipesJson.description:
TFA Vanilla Custard is used here to build up the custard, while also cutting some of that overbearing egginess.  Using ONLY CAP VC 1 will completely drown out all the other flavor accents.
  

#EJUICEMAKERS

reviews.text: I find myself coming back to this one over and over. Definitely a fantastic juice that's more than the sum of its parts!
Very good. I subbed the Cap CDS for TPA and the TPA Custard for FA. Very good albeit a long wait.

21 days was a long wait but in the end it was worth it good thing mixed a 60ml. Like most custard this should get even better with time. Also great job on the percentages brown sugar and the bourbon come through without being drown out by creams
